title: 14-Gauge Round Point Shovel with Fiberglass Long Handle
description: The Bully Tools Round Point Shovel, reinforced fiberglass handle and an extended length ferrule. 14-Gauge Round Point Shovel has a Fiberglass Long Handle. Blade measures 9.25 in. x 11 in. with a 48.5 in. handle. Tool measures 59.25 in. long. The Bully Tools Round Point Shovel comes with a limited lifetime warranty that protects against defects in material and workmanship. Founded in 1994. Bully Tools manufactures gardening and farm tools, shingle removers, floor scrapers, forestry and other specialty tools. With an unprecedented history of quality, Bully Tools is committed to applying the same reliability to our business practices. Bully Tools continues to grow and adapt to meet the ever changing needs of the economy and their consumers.
